metadata.synopsis: Romance with Halsin. The player meets Halsin in a quiet outdoor area (a city park/small grove, Somewhere with trees and greenery) once they've romantically bonded with him. A romance scene ensues. Halsin, aroused, briefly lapses into bear form. The player can encourage him to remain in that form or that of an elf.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start a relationship with Halsin, go to bed that night in camp.

20.speaker: Halsin
20.text: You came. I was concerned you might have had doubts. Or that this might have all been too soon...
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player finds Halsin waiting under a tree. He spots them, eager and a little relieved.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Put your doubts aside. I'm here.

16.speaker: Halsin
16.text: Yes you are. And you're perfect.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Too soon? No - I've been waiting a long time for this.

39.speaker: Halsin
39.text: As have I. It's been worth the wait.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Why, is the big, strong Archdruid Halsin nervous? Adorable.

5.speaker: Halsin
5.text: Perhaps a little. Do you know how hard it's been for me to contain myself?

51.speaker: Halsin
51.text: I'm almost frightened to touch you - if I give in, I may not be able to stop until I have devoured you.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Of course. What else do you think I'm here for?

21.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] He reaches with both hands towards the front of his own clothing and grips. Camera focuses on the player as there is a sudden off-screen rip of fabric. They gape, despite themselves.

Halsin stands before them, naked. He looks at the player like someone dying of thirst would look upon a mountain spring.

29.speaker: Halsin
29.text: Or at least I will try.

46.speaker: Halsin
46.text: As I do you. But nevertheless, I will be gentle.

38.speaker: Halsin
38.text: Almost frightened. If you feel my heart quicken, it's not from fear.

12.speaker: Halsin
12.text: Just as nature intended. Come here to me -
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin's approving reaction CU to the player disrobing off-screen. He takes a step towards the player only to hesitate, as if sensing something.NodeContext: Horny awe. Breaks off at the end, as if sensing something (he's about to involuntarily transform into a bear, out of excitment).

2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Camera focuses on the player reacting with surprise as we hear Halsin turn into a bear off-screen. Once he's transformed, we see him standing on his hind legs, looking bashful. Camera returns to focus on the player as Halsin exits wildshape off-screen. Visual reference for transformations - Similar to DEN_GuardedEntrance_ParentsScene.

31.speaker: Halsin
31.text: Forgive me. I... lost the run of myself. Sometimes, if blood runs hot enough, it's difficult to tame the beast.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

13.speaker: Halsin
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin had accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Yes. Change back again. Let me have the beast... and the beast have me.

25.speaker: Halsin
25.text: Are you certain? It will be untamed, vigorous, and, well... large.
25.context: NodeContext: Hesitant but into it. Player is expressing interest in having sex with him in his bear form (yes, really).

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Large is what I'm here for.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Just imagine we're back in the woods... and I'm your prey.

22.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin takes a deep breath. Camera focuses on the player's face, excited-scared expression, like they're on a roller-coaster, as Halsin enters bear form offscreen. Their eyeline raises as the shadow of approaching bear-Halsin falls on them.

40.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Nearby elsewhere, a squirrel scurries along  the undergrowth. It pauses and stares at something offscreen. Suddenly there's a loud bear roar and the squirrel flees into the night.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Another time then, perhaps. Now come here...

8.speaker: Halsin
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin's eyes very briefly flick downwards at himself as if implying offscreen arousalNodeContext: Erection innuendo intentional

18.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

43.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

52.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

17.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player nods. Halsin presses his whole body against theirs, kissing their neck. The camera rises away from them...

... above, the branches of the tree start to shake.

11.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player nods. Halsin presses his whole body against theirs, kissing their neck. The camera rises away from them...

... above, the branches of the tree start to shake.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Now that you say it, perhaps this was a mistake. I should leave.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Something to keep in mind for another night. But for now, come here.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Actually... I spoke in haste. I think I should leave.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I'm flattered I have that effect on you. Now come here.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: This was a mistake. I think I'd better get dressed...

26.speaker: Halsin
26.text: Ah... I see. Well, of course. Back to camp then.
26.context: NodeContext: Disappointed but dignified about it.

56.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] He moves close to the player. They kiss fiercely. The player backs up out of frame to disrobe. Halsin watches hungrily.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: You don't have to do this.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: Do not misunderstand me. I want this.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: You're not wrong. This was a mistake.

10.speaker: Halsin
10.text: Oh. If that's what you prefer, so be it.
